projects.title: Shadow KYC
projects.description: A privacy-preserving KYC system built using Zero-Knowledge Proofs that allows users to prove KYC compliance without revealing sensitive personal information. Designed for secure, decentralized identity verification on blockchain-based systems.

projects.title: Job Alerts Bot
projects.description: An automated job alert system that continuously monitors job postings, filters them based on predefined criteria, and sends real-time notifications to users. Designed to help candidates stay updated with relevant job opportunities efficiently.

projects.title: Queue-CTL
projects.description: A command-line tool for simulating and controlling queue-based scheduling systems. Built to demonstrate core operating system concepts such as queue management, process handling, and controlled execution flow.

projects.title: Blockopoly
projects.description: Blockopoly is a blockchain-powered version of the classic Monopoly game. It leverages Web3 technologies such as ERC20 tokens, NFTs, and Ethereum smart contracts to create a decentralized, transparent, and trustless gaming experience.

projects.title: ATS Forge
projects.description: A modern, dynamic resume builder that allows users to create, preview, and download beautifully formatted, ATS-friendly resumes directly from the browser with a clean and intuitive UI.

projects.title: HyVault
projects.description: HyVault is a secure file-sharing platform built using hybrid encryption. It combines AES for fast data encryption with RSA for secure key exchange, ensuring true end-to-end encryption and secure data access.

projects.title: Course Lesson Planner
projects.description: An AI-powered lesson planning tool for educators that generates structured lesson plans based on subject, grade, and duration. Uses Gemini LLM with tailored prompt engineering to produce high-quality academic content.

projects.title: SRMAP Mess App
projects.description: A mobile application for SRM University AP students to view daily mess menus and submit feedback. The app improves dining experience by enabling continuous feedback-driven improvements.

projects.title: Environment Monitoring System
projects.description: A system to monitor environmental parameters such as air quality, temperature, and humidity, predict pollution trends using machine learning, and provide real-time alerts for proactive environmental action.

projects.title: Quiz Application
projects.description: A full-stack quiz platform built with the MERN stack, featuring Google OAuth 2.0 authentication, real-time leaderboards, quiz management, and responsive UI with animations.

projects.title: AI Job Matching Platform
projects.description: An AI-powered job matching platform that analyzes resumes and job descriptions using Gemini LLM to provide accurate role matching and personalized job recommendations.

projects.title: CPU Scheduler Simulation
projects.description: A simulation of CPU scheduling algorithms that dynamically manages multiple jobs across CPU cores, demonstrating concepts such as preemptive scheduling, priority handling, and efficient resource allocation.

projects.title: Round Robin Scheduling
projects.description: An implementation of the Round Robin CPU scheduling algorithm that assigns fixed time slices to processes in a cyclic order, ensuring fairness and preventing process starvation.
